resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103939</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103939</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201140</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">CSI: Crime Scene, Investigated: Flesh-eating bugs, moldy corpses, the trail of a killer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">CSI: Verbrechen-Szene, Nachgeforscht: 
Fleisch-Essen der Programmfehler, schimmelige Leichen, die Spur 
eines Mörders</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">CSI : Scène de Crime, Étudiée : 
Chair-manger des anomalies, cadavres moisis, la traînée d'un 
tueur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">CSI: Cena De Crime, Investigada: 
Carne-comendo erros, corpses moldy, a fuga de um assassino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">CSI: Scena Di Crimine, Studiata: 
Carne-consumo degli insetti, corpses moldy, la traccia di un 
assassino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">CSI: Τόπος εγκλήματος, που ερευνάται: 
Σάρκα-κατανάλωση των προγραμματιστικών λαθών, moldy 
corpses, το ίχνος ενός δολοφόνου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">CSI: Escena De Crimen, Investigada: 
Carne-comer fallos de funcionamiento, cadáveres moldy, el 
rastro de un asesino</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Don't leave any goodies behind at the crime scene. Collect the bugs. Collect the maggots, and don't EVER leave a ransom note! Forensic science-it's better than ever!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lassen Sie keine guten Sachen nach an der 
Verbrechenszene. Sammeln Sie die Programmfehler. Sammeln 
Sie die Maden, und nicht ÜBERHAUPT lassen Sie eine 
Lösegeldanmerkung! Gerichtlich Wissenschaft-es besser als 
überhaupt!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ne laissez aucune sucrerie derrière à la scène 
de crime. Rassemblez les anomalies. Rassemblez les larves,
et ne laissez pas JAMAIS une note de rançon ! Légal 
science-il mieux que jamais !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Não deixe nenhuns goodies atrás na cena de 
crime. Colete os erros. Colete as larvas, e não deixe 
SEMPRE uma nota do ransom! Forensic ciência-ele mais melhor do 
que sempre!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Non lasci alcuni goodies dietro alla scena di 
crimine. Raccolga gli insetti. Raccolga le larve e MAI non
lasci una nota del riscatto! Legale scienza-esso più meglio
che mai!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μην αφήστε οποιαδήποτε goodies πίσω στον τόπο 
εγκλήματος. Συλλέξτε τα προγραμματιστικά λάθη. 
Συλλέξτε τις προνύμφες, και μην αφήστε ΠΑΝΤΑ μια σημείωση 
λύτρων! Δικανικός επιστήμη-σου καλύτερα από πάντα!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">No deje ninguna goodies detrás en la escena de 
crimen. Recoja los fallos de funcionamiento. ¡Recoja los 
gusanos, y no deje SIEMPRE una nota del rescate! ¡Forense 
ciencia-él mejor que siempre!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DAVID TENENBAUM
FN:DAVID TENENBAUM
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201140</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103939</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/csi-crime-scene-investigated-flesh-eating-bugs-moldy-corpses-the-trail-of-a-killer</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
